code: import React from'react';import{IntroStyled}from'./styles';import Typed from'react-typed';var Intro=function Intro(props){var welcomeStrings=['welcome to digital detox','take a deep breath','forget about the likes^1000, the comments','...your relatives\' facebook rants','we know how important it is to stay connected','...plugged in','...on top of everything','but sometimes we all need to disconnect','so this is a place to do just that','let it all out^1000','send your thoughts out to the universe','and watch them disappear','try it out...'];return React.createElement(IntroStyled,null,React.createElement(Typed,{strings:welcomeStrings,typeSpeed:100,fadeOut:true,fadeOutDelay:1000,onComplete:props.onComplete}));};export default Intro;
